detached garage available for rent)', '- On-site Maintenance', '- Resort-style Swimming Pool', '- Copy and Fax Services', '- Access to Public Transportation', '- On-call Maintenance', '- Electric Vehicle Charging Station', '- 24-hour Courtesy Patrol', '- Play Area', '- Starbucks Coffee Bar', '- Gated Garage Parking', '- Picnic Area with Barbecue', '- Short-term Leasing Available', '- 24-hour Fitness Center with Water Service', '- Security Cameras', '- High-speed Internet Access', '- Clubhouse', '- Poolside Cabanas', '- Movie Theater', '- State-of-the-art Fitness Center', '- Splash Pad', '- Cable Available', '- Easy Access to Freeways', '- Public Parks Nearby', '- Disability Access', '- Beautiful Landscaping', '- Library and Theater Room', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Welcome Upon Approval.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Limit of 2 pets per home.', 'Maximum adult weight is 25 pounds.', 'ywyoBx3lM']
